message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, but I am confident it could be even more beneficial in your hands. Considering its worth and the impact it could have on your business, I am offering it to you at a special price of $900,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant discount compared to its true value. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you are interested in proceeding with the purchase. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together.
